name: Light Covert Vest
description: Reduces damage before armor by 1 when worn.

name: AMF Jacket
description: Reduce damage before armor from spells, magical skills by 1d4.

name: Tactical Vest
description: Reduces damage before armor by 2 when worn. Also causes the wearer to LOSE LEVERAGE on all rolls due to being HEAVY.

name: Amulet of Protection
description: Reduces damage before armor by 1d4. This reduction can stack with damage reductions.

name: Heavy Bullet Proof Vest
description: Reduces damage before armor by 3 when worn. Also causes the wearer to LOSE LEVERAGE on all rolls due to being HEAVY.
